heroDescription: Connect with your customers like never before.
mainTitle: Just three steps to have your own AI assistant up and running!
step1Description: In less than 2 minutes you can have your AI assistant up and running!
step2Description: In addition to your Instagram user information, you can customize your AI behavior with your data. You can write some text prompts or upload entire PDF's files or csv, and more.
step3Title: Have a 24/7 AI Assistant to your business
step3Description: Imagine having a tireless assistant that works around the clock to engage with your customers, answer their queries, and capture leads. Our 24/7 AI agent ensures that no potential customer slips through the cracks, providing instant responses and personalized interactions. This not only improves your lead conversion rates but also enhances customer satisfaction, making your business more efficient and responsive.
